tool.name: Reopen Contig
tool.description: Reopen Genbank file in a new location

param.name: rebase
param.help: This specified base will be the new first base of the sequence.
param.label: rebase

tool.help:
LIMITATIONS ===========
Currently limited to single genbank records (no multi-genome genbank files)
DESCRIPTION ===========
This tool reopens contigs in a specific location, without otherwise modifying the file. This is **very important** as the traditional method of doing this has involved adding and removing features in the genbank file. Failure to remove these features when done is **common**, and results in **terrible** looking student genome maps. As such, this tool should be used exclusively to all other methods.
